column4: i'm running 12.04 64bits, i want to run Sql server so i need xp but it dosen't work in Virtualbox 4.1.10 , & when i use a previousely installed vdi image the system run very slowly , no way to use it
i know all that , i tried it even in Oneirc it dosen't work too
have you a CPU with virt extensions? If so I would use KVM
i have a sandy bridge i5 cpu with intel virtualisation
